DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test how rifampin affects the removal of BMS-247550 (ixabepilone) from the body.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of Ixabepilone in Patients With Advanced Cancer
DOC.criteria: Up to three prior chemotherapy regimens Measurable or nonmeasurable disease Available for treatment and followup Neuropathy Uncontrolled cardiovascular disease Refusal to participate in genetic analysis
